channel.title: Funk on Hansen's Songbook
channel.description: Recent content in Funk on Hansen's Songbook

item.title: I wanna be your lover
item.description: I ain't got no money I ain't like those other guys you hang around It's kinda funny But they always seem to let you down And I get discouraged 'Cause I never see you anymore And I need your love, babe That's all I'm living for, yeah I didn't want to pressure you, baby But all I ever wanted to do I want to be your lover I want to be the only one that makes you come, running I want to be your lover I want to turn you on, turn you out All night long, make you shout Oh, lover, yeah!
